name: Traveller (chenz97)
description:
Traveller is a third-person exploration and puzzle game. The player plays the role of a player who has lost all his memories and needs to solve puzzles, complete tasks and NPC's dialogue and other mechanisms to obtain clues about the memory fragments. The game is divided into three levels: the game's overall atmosphere from the first level of suspense with doubt to the second level of warmth and accessibility. Finally, the player will fully understand their identity through clues to make a choice. 

Movement: mouse to control the direction and view /WASD

Interaction： E

Team Members:

Yunxin Feng: Producer/UI designer

Zhihao Chen: Programmer

Chenxu Cui: Character 3D modelling

Luoyi Jin: Art designer

Yuqing Guo： Storyline Teller
